title: Large group of t204s I'm looking to downgrade
author: shammus

posts.post_title: Large group of t204s I'm looking to downgrade
posts.post_content:
Not sure how many people are looking to upgrade t204s in their collection right now but I do have some nice mid-to-high grade t204s available that I can downgrade.  Several toughies such as Pelty, Bates, Reilly and Raymond are a part of this group as well. 

In return, I'm willing to accept raw cards, Aut Holders, SGC 10s, PSA 1s, etc...

Players included in this group are the following -

Bates SGC 40
Dorner sGC 55
Clymer SGC 70
Davis SGC 50 --- TRADED!!
Fromme SGC 40
Hemphill SGC 40
Loebert PSA 4 --- TRADED!!
McCormick SGC 40
Manning PSA 4
McAleer PSA 5 --- TRADED!!
Morgan SGC 55  --- TRADED!
Murphy SGC 45
Niles PSA 5
Pelty SGC 40 (Lionel Carter)
Raymond PSA 3
Reilly SGC 50
Reulbach SGC 50  --- TRADED!
Shipke SGC 45

Tried to upload scans of each card but my camara phone's not the greatest.  I'm happy to send better scans of the individual cards if anyone would like them.  

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=314007&d=1525023579[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=314008&d=1525023604[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=314012&d=1525024084[/IMG]
Figured I'd bump this once....any takers?

Had a few nibbles here and the Davis has successfully been downgraded!  Any other takers?

Thanks!
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]

Several of these are off the board at this point (see original list above) but there's still plenty of upgrade opportunities out there for anyone interested!  Thanks in advance!

Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]
